name: BLOOBO - Web Version
description:
This is a WebGL Version of the game. For the main page of this game, go to https://wearsglasses.itch.io/bloobo

Web version has possible bugs. Go to the main page for a Windows Executable version.

Bloobo is an atmospheric 2D physics-based, puzzle game where you must guide the ball from one tube to another.

  • Design in Edit Mode by arranging lines and items 
  • Simulate in Play Mode the physical outcome of your plan
  • Evaluate the outcome and redesign accordingly

Developed by Jacob Ruttenberg and Chaoran Huang
